titleStmt.title: Considerations touching the likeliest means to remove hirelings out of the church wherein is also discourc'd of tithes, church-fees, church-revenues, and whether any maintenance of ministers can be settl'd by law / the author J.M.
titleStmt.author: Milton, John, 1608-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for L. Chapman ...,
